items.content_html: Political Content Blocker is a lightweight Chrome extension that blocks political content using customizable keywords. It comes with a predefined list and allows you to add or remove terms for personalized browsing control.

items.content_html: üéâ A lightweight, type-safe library for generating OpenAPI documentation using decorators in Express.js applications. This package allows you to define OpenAPI metadata (paths, parameters, responses, etc.) directly in your controllers using decorators, making it easy to keep your API documentation in sync with your code
items.title: jonace-mpelule/openapi-express-decorators: üéâ A lightweight, type-safe library for generating OpenAPI documentation using decorators in Express.js applications. This package allows you to define OpenAPI metadata (paths, parameters, responses, etc.) directly in your controllers using decorators, making it easy to keep your API documentation in sync with your code
